name: Symbiote (Epiin, Fellblade)
description:
You are playing as a symbiotic virus. Your goal is to infect everyone.

  • You can control infected units (purple light).
  • Left click to select infected units.
  • Your virus burns through the host and kills the host after a little while. (Watch the purple light)
  • Right click to move.
  • Right click to attack a healthy unit.
  • Don't let any healthy unit see you while infecting. (the flash lights)

Credit to Fellblade for the art and animations.

Credit to a freeware model pack for the 3d modals.
